H0.text: Gravity is the force that brakes use to stop a moving bicycle.

H1.text: Friction is the kind of force that brakes use to stop a moving bicycle.

H2.text: Magnetic is the type of force that bicycle brakes use to stop a moving bicycle.

H3.text: Push is the kind of force brakes use to stop a moving bicycle.

A4.text: Most bicycle brake systems ... convert, via friction, kinetic energy of the bike and rider into thermal energy to be dissipated.
